detail_desc: Top in a patterned cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck and pearly buttons down the front. Smocking at the back and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with an all-over print, round neckline and an elasticated drawstring at the hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with an all-over print, round neckline and an elasticated drawstring at the hem.
Cold shoulder playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and flounces that go round the arms. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.
Cold shoulder playsuit in patterned jersey with narrow shoulder straps and flounces that go round the arms. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs.

Sleeveless playsuit in printed viscose jersey with frills down the front and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Elasticated seam at the waist, diagonal front pockets and wide legs.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a twisted detail at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck.
Sleeveless top in jersey with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar with a twisted detail at the front and an opening at the back with a button at the back of the neck.

Pyjama top and shorts in soft viscose jersey. Top with narrow, elasticated shoulder straps in lace that continues around the armholes. Shorts with covered elastication and a sewn-on satin bow at the waist and lace-trimmed hems.
T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline and short puff sleeves with a narrow trim.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a viscose and cotton blend with an embroidered motif around the neckline and short frill trims around the sleeves.

5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled. Embrace – denim with a smart stretch function that moulds to the body for a comfortable, flattering silhouette.
Round-necked top in hole-patterned jersey. Puff sleeves with smocking and a frill trim at the hems.
Longer cardigan in an airy, pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.
Longer cardigan in an airy, pattern knit. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. No fasteners.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Short-sleeved dress in soft, patterned, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline, a gathered seam at the top and a flared skirt.
Top in a soft, textured knit. Relaxed fit with a slightly wider neckline, decorative buttons down the back, and long, wide sleeves with wide trims at the cuffs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and wide legs.

A-line skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Unlined. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.

A-line skirt in washed, stretch cotton denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), buttons down the front and patch front pockets. Unlined. The skirt is made partly from recycled cotton.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets.
Dungaree dress in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable straps with metal fasteners and patch front pockets.
Top in soft cotton jersey with an interactive motif on the front, narrow trims around the neckline and short sleeves with turn-ups.
